author: Todd Carothers
title: How unified communications is providing continuity and comfort during the coronavirus pandemic
description: Millions are coming to terms with a different way of working.
content: Remote working has been, until very recently, the exception rather than the rule. With the development of the coronavirus public health crisis, and COVID-19 being declared a pandemic by the World Heath Organisation, this has all been flipped on its head. Mill… [+4242 chars]
